loading data & early prep. 

```{r}

#read data 
df <- read_csv("FPTT.csv")

#as factor
df <- df %>%
mutate(network = factor(network),
      population = factor(population),
      sigma = factor(sigma),
      colab_cond = factor(colab_cond),
      net_size = factor(net_size),
      true_model = factor(true_model))

```

FPTT for the clean data (non-inf). 
Preparation

```{r}

#omit na
df_omit <- na.omit(df)

#subtracting 
df_clean <- df_omit %>%
  mutate(extra_agents = orig_agents - 1,
         FPTT = first_study - ((extra_agents / 2) + switch_testing))

```

FPTT over variables

```{r}

overview <- function(.dataframe, .var1){
  
  var1 <- enquo(.var1)
  
  df <- .dataframe %>%
  group_by(UQ(var1)) %>%
  summarize(FPTT_mean = mean(first_study),
            FPTT_median = median(first_study),
            FPTT_IQR = IQR(first_study),
            FPTT_SD = sd(first_study))
  
  return(df)
  
}

#what can I group over?
colnames(df_clean)

populations <- overview(df_clean, population)
networks <- overview(df_clean, network)
sigma <- overview(df_clean, sigma)
true_model <- overview(df_clean, true_model)
net_size <- overview(df_clean, net_size)
colab_cond <- overview(df_clean, colab_cond)

```

with NAs 

```{r}

#subtracting 
df_NA <- df %>%
  mutate(extra_agents = orig_agents - 1,
         FPTT = first_study - ((extra_agents / 2) + switch_testing))

#summarize 
overview <- function(.dataframe, .var1){
  
  var1 <- enquo(.var1)
  
  df <- .dataframe %>%
  group_by(UQ(var1)) %>%
  summarise(FPTT_mean = mean(first_study, na.rm = TRUE),
            FPTT_median = median(first_study, na.rm = TRUE),
            FPTT_IQR = IQR(first_study, na.rm = TRUE),
            FPTT_SD = sd(first_study, na.rm = TRUE),
            FPTT_NA = sum(is.na(first_study)))
  
  return(df)
  
}

populations <- overview(df_NA, population)
networks <- overview(df_NA, network)
sigma <- overview(df_NA, sigma)
true_model <- overview(df_NA, true_model)
net_size <- overview(df_NA, net_size)
colab_cond <- overview(df_NA, colab_cond)



```



plotting? 

```{r}

p_load(readr, tidyverse, ggplot2, RColorBrewer, reshape2, ggthemes,
       viridis, ggridges, ggunchained, rlang)

#preparing raincloud (can be customized)
raincloud_theme = theme(
text = element_text(size = 10),
axis.title.x = element_text(size = 16),
axis.title.y = element_text(size = 16),
axis.text = element_text(size = 14),
axis.text.x = element_text(vjust = 0.5),
legend.title=element_text(size=16),
legend.text=element_text(size=16),
legend.position = "right",
plot.title = element_text(lineheight=.8, face="bold", size = 16),
panel.border = element_blank(),
panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
axis.line.x = element_line(colour = 'black', size=0.5, linetype='solid'),
axis.line.y = element_line(colour = 'black', size=0.5, linetype='solid'))
```

```{r}
#raincloud plot

FPTT_FUN <- function(df, .var){
  
  var <- enquo(.var)

g <- df %>%
  filter(FPTT < 500) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = UQ(var), 
             y = FPTT, fill = UQ(var))) +
  geom_flat_violin(position = position_nudge(x = .2, y = 0), alpha = .8) +
  geom_point(aes(y = FPTT, color = UQ(var)), 
                  position = position_jitter(width = .15), 
                  size = .5, alpha = 0.8) +
  geom_boxplot(width = .1, outlier.shape = NA, alpha = 0.5) +
  expand_limits(x = 3) +
  guides(fill = FALSE) + 
  guides(color = FALSE) +
  scale_fill_tableau() +
  scale_color_tableau() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = paste0("FPTT for ", as_label(var), "s"), #with s?
       subtitle = "Averaged over all other grouping variables",
       x = paste0(as_label(var), "s"), #with s?
       y = "FPTT") +
  raincloud_theme

#call the plot
g

}

FPTT_FUN(df_clean, network)
FPTT_FUN(df_clean, population)
FPTT_FUN(df_clean, sigma)
FPTT_FUN(df_clean, true_model)

```
